channel.title: Skills on Junbin Huang
channel.description: Recent content in Skills on Junbin Huang

item.title: Positional Notations in Python
item.description: 1. Hexadecimal to decimal: >>> int('0xf',16) 15 2. Binary to decimal: >>> int('10100111110',2) 1342 3. Octonary to decimal: >>> int('17',8) 15 4. Decimal to hexadecimal: >>> hex(1033) '0x409' 5. Binary to hexadecimal: >>> hex(int('101010',2)) '0x2a' 6. Octonary to hexadecimal: >>> hex(int('17',8)) '0xf' 7. Decimal to binary: >>> bin(10) '0b1010' 8. Hexadecimal to binary: >>> bin(int('ff',16)) '0b11111111' 9. Octonary to binary: >>> bin(int('17',8)) '0b1111' 10. Binary to octonary: >>> oct(0b1010) '012' 11.

item.title: Little Skills
item.description: This is a blog of summary of the little skills which are useful in daily life. 1. Connect the keyboard to the Ubuntu system computer with bluetooth 1. sudo apt-get install bluez-hcidump 2. sudo hcidump -at Then connect the keyboard and monitor the output. Reference：Ubuntu 下连接蓝牙键盘
